trans-unit.source: Gives access to the entity and an <see langword="XLinq" /> object that represents an Atom entry.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso à entidade e a um objeto <see langword="XLinq" /> que representa uma entrada Atom.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs" /> is used with the <see cref="E:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.ReadingEntity" /> and <see cref="E:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.WritingEntity" /> events.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs" /> é usado com os eventos <see cref="E:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.ReadingEntity" /> e <see cref="E:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.WritingEntity" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs> are used with the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.ReadingEntity> and <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.WritingEntity> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs> são usados com o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.ReadingEntity> e <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.WritingEntity> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets an XML Atom entry or feed data represented as <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma entrada do Atom XML ou dados de feed representados como <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The Atom entry or feed data is read from a GET request or a POST request about to be sent to the data service.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de entrada ou feed Atom é lido de uma solicitação POST prestes a ser enviado ao serviço de dados ou de uma solicitação GET.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object representation of data returned from the <see cref="P:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs.Data" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a representação de objeto de dados retornados da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs.Data" />.

trans-unit.source: This object is populated for both incoming and outgoing entities.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto é preenchido para entidades de entrada e saídas.
